name: HH_GOAL_HX_CNCT
description: This table stores goal history information for Home Health & Hospice care plan contacts.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_CSN
columns.description: This item specifies the patient contact associated with a goal visit note addendum.

columns.name: HX_ADDENDUM_LN
columns.description: This item specifies the addendum number for the contact specified in the Goals information (I IGO 27500) field.

columns.name: HX_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores historical values of the outcome as of each addendum.

columns.name: HX_NOTES_CONTACT
columns.description: This item tracks the goal's visit notes contact number (I HNO 10) field on a per-addendum basis.
